name: Acadium - Marketing Apprenticeships & Courses
description: Get job-ready with remote, digital apprenticeships under an experienced mentor.  Grow your business or learn digital marketing through remote apprenticeships. Acadium is the platform that connects business owners and marketing professionals with motivated aspiring digital marketers eager to launch their careers. In exchange for marketing knowledge, mentorship, and real-world experience, Acadium apprentices work unpaid for up to ten hours per week over the course of a three-month remote apprenticeship. The business grows, the apprentice becomes more employable, and both parties get the added benefit of building valuable industry relationships with people outside of their existing networks.  SKILLS FOR EXPERIENCE: Acadium offers a unique win-win where the time and skills of apprentices are exchanged for mentorship from experienced business owners and marketing professionals. Both mentor and apprentice get value, and grow professionally as well as personally.  MAKE REAL CONNECTIONS: At its core, Acadium was made to connect people from around the world and learn from each other. Amazing things can be achieved through inclusivity and diverse thought!  PRODUCTIVITY TOOLS: We offer a suite of productivity tools to ensure both students and businesses are able to communicate effectively and stay on task. We think of the little things, so you can focus on your making an impact in your apprenticeship.  WEVE GOT YOUR BACK: Get prompt support from our Member Success team before, during and after your apprenticeship.  For students: - No matter what level of experience you have, you can learn digital marketing from businesses whove been there before. - Completely remote and always free, all you need is an internet connection and a desire to learn. - Decide the type of experience you want to gain, then network and build valuable industry relationships with the businesses that interest you the most. - Take our free digital marketing courses on a wide range of subjects to learn the basics before starting your apprenticeship. - Complete apprenticeships for a chance to win thousands in Acadium scholarships. The more you complete, the better your chances of winning!  For businesses : - Exchange your marketing knowledge and mentorship for ten hours of help per week on your marketing tasks, allowing you to scale your business faster without breaking the bank. - Shape the next generation of marketers and change lives by giving hard working people from around the world a start in their dream career! - Integrate a marketing apprenticeship program into your business, gain managerial experience and have a pipeline of motivated candidates to accelerate growth.
